---
id: organization-service-get-portal-links
title: "Get Portal link"

hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Markdown from "@theme/Markdown";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Portal link"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/organizations/{id}/portal_links"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the Admin portal link if it exists. Use Generate Portal link to create and fetch a link

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}

  open={true}
>

    >
      Path Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"description":"Organization ID","name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><div>
  <div>
    <ApiTabs
      label={undefined}
      id={undefined}
    >
      <TabItem

      >

          >

              value={"application/json"}
            >
              <SchemaTabs

              >
                <TabItem
                  label={"Schema"}
                  value={"Schema"}
                >

                    style={{}}

                    data-collapsed={false}

                  >
                    <summary
                      style={{}}
                      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}
                    >
                      <strong>
                        Schema
                      </strong>
                    </summary><div
                      style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                    >
                      
                    </div><ul
                      style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                    >
                      <SchemaItem
                        collapsible={true}
                        className={"schemaItem"}
                      >
                        <details
                          style={{}}
                          className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
                        >
                          <summary
                            style={{}}
                          >
                            <span
                              className={"openapi-schema__container"}
                            >
                              <strong
                                className={"openapi-schema__property"}

                            </span>

                          >

                              style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}
                            >
                              
                              
                              Admin Portal Links
                              
                              
                            </div><li>
                              <div
                                style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}
                              >
                                Array [
                              </div>
                            </li><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"expire_time"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"date-time"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"Expiry time of the link. The link is valid for 1 week.","type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-02-06T14:48:00.000Z"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"id"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"Unique Identifier for the link","type":"string","example":"lnk_123123123123123"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"location"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"Location of the link. This is the URL that can be used to access the Admin portal. The link is valid for 1 week.","type":"string","example":"https://scalekit.com/portal/lnk_123123123123123"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><li>
                              <div
                                style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}
                              >
                                ]
                              </div>
                            </li>
                          </div>
                        </details>
                      </SchemaItem>
                    </ul>
                  </details>
                </TabItem><TabItem
                  label={"Example (from schema)"}
                  value={"Example (from schema)"}
                >
                  <ResponseSamples
                    responseExample={"{\n  \"links\": [\n    {\n      \"expire_time\": \"2024-02-06T14:48:00.000Z\",\n      \"id\": \"lnk_123123123123123\",\n      \"location\": \"https://scalekit.com/portal/lnk_123123123123123\"\n    }\n  ]\n}"}
                    language={"json"}
                  >
